edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rpc.net.kad

Interface KeybasedRoutingProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingletonKeybasedRoutingProvider

    public interface KeybasedRoutingProvider
    Provides the interface for a class that provides instances of KeybasedRouting.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      il.technion.ewolf.kbr.KeybasedRouting getKeybasedRouting()

    • Method Detail

      • getKeybasedRouting

        il.technion.ewolf.kbr.KeybasedRouting getKeybasedRouting()
        Returns an instance of the KeybasedRouting kademlia node.

      • makeURI

        java.net.URI makeURI(java.net.URI uri)
                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Makes a kademlia-compatible URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to transform. Necessary components are the host and the port.
        Returns:
        a URI compatible with KeybasedRouting.join(java.util.Collection<java.net.URI>).
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • makeURI

        java.net.URI makeURI(java.net.InetAddress address,
                   int port)
                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Makes a kademlia-compatible URI.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the remote node.
        port - the port on which the remote node has a KeybasedRouting instance listening.
        Returns:
        a URI compatible with KeybasedRouting.join(java.util.Collection<java.net.URI>).
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
